SmartFieldSpec.Description: Number of Months of Child Sponsorship (Tenure)
SmartFieldSpec.Author: Memphis Sellers
SmartFieldSpec.DisplayName: Number of Months of Child Sponsorship (Tenure)
SmartFieldSpec.CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_SMARTFIELD_NUMBERMONTHSCHILDSPONSORSHIPTENURE ( @ASOF datetime ) as ;with cteLatestChildSponsorshipEndDate as ( select ft.CONSTITUENTID as PayerID, max(sp.ENDDATE) as SponEndDate
from dbo.USR_V_QUERY_SPONSORSHIPEXTENSION as sp_ext join dbo.V_QUERY_SPONSORSHIP as sp on sp_ext.ID = sp.ID join dbo.REVENUESPLIT rs on sp.REVENUESPLITID = rs.ID join dbo.FINANCIALTRANSACTION ft on ft.ID = rs.REVENUEID join dbo.V_QUERY_SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITY as so on sp_ext.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID = so.ID left outer join dbo.V_QUERY_SPONSORSHIPTRANSACTION as sp_trans on sp.[ID] = sp_trans.CONTEXTSPONSORSHIPID
where so.[TYPE] = N'Child' and ( sp_trans.[ACTION] in (N'Terminate', N'Cancel') and sp_trans.ISLASTTRANSACTION = 1 and ((sp_trans.REASON not in (N'Account Correction', N'User Correction')) or sp_trans.REASON is null or sp_trans.REASON = '') ) and sp_ext.CURRENTOPPORTUNITYSPONSORSHIPSTATUS in (N'Formerly Sponsored', N'Formerly Unpaid Sponsored') group by ft.CONSTITUENTID)
select cte.PayerID, datediff(mm, ESSD.VALUE, SponEndDate) as MonthsTenure from cteLatestChildSponsorshipEndDate cte inner join dbo.SMARTFIELD41F1739DAA7F433DAF1DDDA18D6C8A6B ESSD on cte.PayerID = ESSD.ID --and ESSD.VALUE >= '1/1/2009'
